description:
Globally recognized, PMI Certifications demonstrates that you have the experience, education and competency to lead and direct projects.

The PMI-ACP Certification requires you to pass a 120-questions exam, and this course is designed to help you review content and show you the shortcuts for a perfect score.

Pass the PMI-ACP Exam With Flying Colors with this Comprehensive Practice Course

  • Exam Outline and Course Review
  • Agile Project Management Framework
  • Agile: Estimation, Metrics, Planning, Monitoring & Controlling, Risk Management, Quality
  • Soft Skill Negotiation
  • Value Base Prioritization

Contents and Overview Through 4.8 hours of video content, 27 lectures this comprehensive test-prep course covers everything you need to pass the test. Students have access to all exam topics to make preparing for the exam fast and easy.
title: PMI-ACP Exam Prep
